text: The district administration has initiated action against 121 firms that functioned on Republic Day on Tuesday. Collector V. Sampath said that as per the Tamil Nadu Industrial Establishments (National and festival Holidays) Act, 1958, the Tamil Nadu Catering Establishments Act, 1958 and the Motor Transport Workers Act, 1961, hotels, organisation and transport offices should not function and employees should be granted leave with a day’s wage. A joint inspection conducted by officials found 54 industries, 62 eateries and five transport offices functioning on Tuesday. Hence, action was initiated against these establishments as per law, the Collector said.
title: Action taken
